summary: POSCO, a leading steel company, is undertaking a comprehensive infrastructure reorganization to achieve decarbonization with eco-friendly raw materials, carbon capture and recycling, and hydrogen reduction steelmaking under its 2050 Carbon Neutrality commitment.
